tracks.text: Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. The ID Shard, a diamond shaped pendant, swings in darkness.
Thirdrema, a western style town, stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, Elke, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
Wethermon, a metal samurai, stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
Kirin, a metal horse, rears in front of a red moon
A golden Reward Scales shift
Sunraku holds a two handed long sword and strikes at shadowy ghouls that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
A headless horse and horseman gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over skeletal monsters
Wethermon draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
The Rebirth Tearjewel lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a moon blade. Wearing a beetle helmet and diamond shaped pendant, he runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
Text, 20, Current situations and next steps
Leaves and branches fall in the Prismatic Forest Grotto. Items lay on the ground.
Dust clears around Psyger-0's dark form
She unequips her sword, and her armor turns white.
Sunraku looks down at the loot
He and Katzo start picking things up
Psyger-0 kneels and picks up loot
Psyger-0 steps forward
She glows
She warps away
Thirdrema
At the inn, Emul hides her face under a pillow.
She leaps at him, knocking him back to the ground.
He puts Emul back on the bed
He winks
She leaps at him, knocking him back to the ground.
Utopia headquarters
A sleek, silver sports car pulls up.
Text, Developer of Shangri-La Frontier, Utopia Entertainment Software.
A valet opens the door for a man in a brown suit.
Text, Utopia Head of PR Divison, Sakai Tsukuyogi. Kanji spelling, Sakai = border, Tsukuyogi = Tree + Rabbit + Night + Branch
The elevator arrives, heading down from floor 1.
Tsukuyogi pulls a bottle out of his pocket. Chinese Herbal Digestive Medicine. It's empty.
Elevator doors close.
The doors of floor B10 open. A woman in black shoes and a lab coat walks out. She grinds her teeth. She has short, angular black hair and green eyes.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier Executive Producer Ritsu Amachi. Kanji spelling, Ritsu = Laws, Amachi = Heaven + Earth
She waves her ID card over a console.
Doors open. Room label, Original Text Reference Room
She enters the large room with glowing lights and a single desk in the center.
Obscured by the monitor, a woman sits. She has long, messy brown hair and blue eyes. She wears a track suit. Text, Utopia Founder, World Creative Administrator, Tsukuyo Tsukuri.
The women pull on each others faces.
Sakai watches the fight from the doorway and holds his stomach.
Ritsu elbows Sakai
They both kick him the stomach. He falls back. Text, Damage 1
Fade to white. Rakuro's house, night time
Rakuro sleeps in bed.
Rei's house. Rei lies awake in her futon.
Sunraku stands, muscular, backdropped by pink and sparkles and bubbles
Text, She means items left behind by the Ashura Kai. (Not actually presents)
She blushes and covers her face.
Rakuro's house, daytime
Taped up sign reading, Important business until tomorrow morning, Stay out!
Rakuro pulls down the sign and crumples it.
He eats a sandwich
Ice cold Riot Blood
He puts on the VR goggles and lies in bed.
Sunraku wakes up in bed
He sits up
Emul cries
Rabituza palace
Emul rubs her face on Sunraku's leg
Vash exhales
His eyes tense. His fists clench.
He bites a carrot
Emul stares and drools
World map
An attedant opens the door.
Vash steps out, smiling.
Text, Level 78
Tome of Truth, Clear Sky Skillbook, Inventoria Key
He squeezes Emul's face
He takes the iron circlet covered in circuitry and clamps it around his wrist.
It fuses with his skin. A magic circle appears before him, and he vanishes.
A gallery displays mechas, robots, armor, and weapons
Non-Standard Specialized Armor, Adebane
Armament, Keep-Out Wire. Armament: Blade, Harbinger.
Red spider lillies wave
Pencilgon stands in front of Setsuna's grave stone.
She kneels, and places a vase with 2 white flowers in front of the stone. The flowers resemble chrysanthemums and dahlias.
She walks away, smiling
Spiky rock formations litter a wasteland.
On the highest point sits Lycagon, with a black, ominous aura, and crackling with purple lightning.
Lycagon smiles
Text, New Chapter, "Venturing Wolves, Be Ambitious."
Text, 25, The speedrunner's visit to the Hidden Flower Grave
Daytime, She uses a dagger to kill the Ravenous Python in front of a rope bridge.
She holds a knife to a man's throat
Nighttime, In Thirdrema, she runs off
A girl holds white flowers
She runs through Thirdrema
She jumps off of a guard's face
